summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 5, Montlake Park Addition, being the alley between Montlake Boulevard East Park Drive and Shelby Street, and Hamlin Street and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 103808 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
